projects.name: CT Learn
projects.description:
Unlike other Visual Learning Environments, CTlearn User Interface (UI) is simplified making it easier to navigate the system thereby helping those with low IT knowledge to use the platform without series of training.

Being a decentralized Visual Learning Environment (VLE) will help solve the learning cultural differences that exist within our schools and Higher Institutions.

CTlearn User Interface (UI) makes it easier for teachers with lower IT skills to easily navigate within the entire system without undergoing several training on how to use CTlearn.

projects.name: Projkonnect
projects.description:
Projkonnect is an Edtech project that is Bridging Academics and Career Through Entrepreneurial Innovation

Connect with industry leaders and academic innovators to turn learning into career opportunities. Build skills, expand networks, and bridge academics with professional success.

projects.name: Confide Community
projects.description: Confide Community is a social network supporting your need to share confidences, hopes, dreams, problems, learn, inspire, and laughter. It's a meeting place for making new friends based on mutual interests and issues relevant to your life.

projects.name: Forextainment
projects.description:
Forextainment is  a fast, social-first Flutter app with real-time community engagement. It blends a clean, modern UI with Firebase speed and reliability to deliver posts, comments, reposts, likes, and saves that feel instant and seamless across platforms.
Features: 
- Real-time social feed
- Guest mode
- Email verification flow
- Optimistic UI updates, infinite scroll, and responsive UX
- Robust Firebase security rules for granular permissions
- Admin broadcast messages and in-app announcements
- Pagination for performance

projects.name: Ahiaoma Seller
projects.description:
This is a production-ready Flutter app enabling marketplace resellers to manage products and orders efficiently.

- Backend: Supabase (auth, profiles, storage, real-time)
- State management: Provider with a clean, modular architecture
- Notifications: OneSignal + flutter_local_notifications (push & local)
- Deep links: password reset and other routed flows
- Security: secure persistence via encrypted storage
- UI: responsive layouts with ScreenUtil
- Delivery: iOS & Android ready, env-driven config with dotenv

projects.name: Ahiaoma
projects.description:
Ahiaoma is a production-ready Flutter marketplace built for speed, reliability, and scale.
(Contact me for Demo)

Features and Perks:
- Responsive product catalog, high‑performance image grids, category browsing, search, and price filtering.
- Clean Architecture, modular UI, Provider state management, multi‑environment configs, secure local storage.
- Supabase authentication and user profiles.
- Granular Notification handling and deep‑link–ready taps.
- Role‑based dashboard and controls.
- Robust error handling, smooth scrolling, offline‑friendly UX.

testimonials.author: Chinaemerem U.
testimonials.message: "I hired Ephraim to train students in Mobile Application Development, but I have seen him develop several mobile applications from the ground up for clients globally. He is daring and shows a good attitude to work. He is a professional. I recommend him."

testimonials.author: Emmanuel O
testimonials.message: "Working with Ephraim was a very great experience. He's very lively and you can always be assured he's a professional and he knows what he's doing and he enjoys doing it. I look forward to working with him more in the future."

testimonials.author: Ezediniru D.
testimonials.message: "I have worked with Ephraim Umunnakwe for several years, and he kept on delivering high-quality scalable projects and always implement following standard code practices. He is one of the best dev have ever met."

testimonials.author: Chinonso I
testimonials.message: "I hired Ephraim U. to help connect the mobile app frontend of my teams application that was built with Flutter to Firebase and he did a very good job by first resolving the issues we had with dependency on the frontend that was built with Flutter, and then connected it to Firebase that made the app fully function within one month."

testimonials.author: Mba A.
testimonials.message: "I hired Ephraim U. as a Flutter developer and CTO to help in building our company mobile application. He was responsible for writing the code from scratch to launching the finished product."

personalInfo.name: Ephraim Umunnakwe
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Hi, I’m Ephraim Umunnakwe,  but most people know me as King Raym. I’m a Flutter-focused mobile developer from Nigeria, passionate about turning ideas into beautiful, functional apps. Through Raym Universe, I bring creativity and precision together to build digital experiences that inspire, solve problems, and stand out.
